• Contribution to Data Engineering projects
• PoC and Experiments on various technology

• Typescript
• AWS cloud (hands-on)
• AWS lambda, Kinesis services hands-on
• Databases and SQL
• Microservices

Good To Have Experience On
• Python
• AWS Glue, S3 Athena

jobs_results.title: Software Engineer, Backend Developer - India
jobs_results.description:
All roles at JumpCloud are Remote unless otherwise specified in the Job Description.

About JumpCloud

JumpCloud’s mission is to Make Work Happen®, providing simple, secure access to an organization’s technology resources from any device, or any location. The JumpCloud Open Directory Platform gives IT, security operations, and DevOps a single, cloud-based solution to control and manage employee identities and their devices, and apply conditional access controls based on Zero Trust principals. Since launching in 2012, our global user base has grown to more than 150,000 organizations, with more than 5,000 paying customers including Cars.com, GoFundMe, Grab, ClassPass, Uplight and Peloton. JumpCloud has raised over $400M from world-class investors including Sapphire Ventures, General Atlantic, Sands Capital, Atlassian, and CrowdStrike. Our teams are growing fast, too, and we're looking for talent across engineering, sales, customer success, marketing, product management, and more. Join... our team of dedicated, passionate, and creative people who are eager to change the IT industry forever.

Do you enjoy solving challenging problems using the latest technologies within a great team? Is knowing your work will be highly visible and mission critical a key component for the next step in your career? At JumpCloud, we’re looking for best-in-class talent to help define the future of modern identity and device management from the ground up.

JumpCloud is looking for an experienced Software Engineer to join an engineering team focusing on OAuth, OpenID Connect, Public Key Infrastructure (PKI) and working with services that use all of these technologies. Identity Management (IM) services are a key part of the entire JumpCloud product portfolio. Along with our Authentication and Authorization services, IM provides the foundation for our identity and security solutions, both cloud and device based. The Identity team’s work will make using JumpCloud even easier and more seamless, while providing a very high level of security.

What we are looking for:
• 3-8 years experience developing distributed systems, microservices, and REST APIs (including using them as integration points with third-party applications) in a variety of programming languages including Golang.
• Experience using one of the public cloud providers (AWS, GCP or Azure) with CI/CD pipelines (Travis/CircleCI) to build, test and deploy.
• Willingness to mentor junior members of the team.
• Bonus points if you have experience with Python, Docker, feature flags, and BDD.

What you will be doing:
• Feature implementation through both individual contributions and providing guidance in terms of organization, process and design.
• Our team primarily uses Go, although experience with other modern languages is fine.
• We collaborate closely with architects, UX, and DevOps to ensure our systems are highly available, scalable, performant, and deliver an amazing user experience.
• We use the scrum framework.
• Learning and working with cryptography and security concepts, including PKI and TLS/SSL agreement protocols, authentication, symmetric and asymmetric encryption, and related concepts. Bonus points if you have experience with these already.
• Using OAuth/OIDC flows to authenticate users and then allow them to use services.
• Integrate identity via certs, OAuth and other methods into cloud services like AWS API Gateway.
• Work with 3rd party applications like mesh VPNs to ensure that these applications work with JumpCloud provided identity.
• Shape the future of our Identity Management services roadmap by participating in planning/scoping conversations with product managers.
• Help the team and organization live by our core values: building connections, thinking big and getting 1% better every day.

#LI-PD1

Where you’ll be working/Location:

JumpCloud is committed to being Remote First, meaning that you are able to work remotely within the country noted in the Job Description.

This role is remote in the country of India. You must be located in and authorized to work in India to be considered for this role.

Why JumpCloud?

If you thrive working in a fast, SaaS-based environment and you are passionate about solving challenging technical problems, we look forward to hearing from you! JumpCloud is an incredible place to share and grow your expertise! You’ll work with amazing talent across each department who are passionate about our mission. We’re out of the box thinkers, so your unique ideas and approaches for conceiving a product and/or feature will be welcome. You’ll have a voice in the organization as you work with a seasoned executive team, a supportive board and in a proven market that our customers are excited about.

One of JumpCloud's three core values is to “Build Connections.” To us that means creating " human connection with each other regardless of our backgrounds, orientations, geographies, religions, languages, gender, race, etc. We care deeply about the people that we work with and want to see everyone succeed." - Rajat Bhargava, CEO

Please submit your résumé and brief explanation about yourself and why you would be a good fit for JumpCloud. Please note JumpCloud is not accepting third party resumes at this time.

JumpCloud is an equal opportunity employer. All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran or disability status.

#LI-Remote #BI-Remote

jobs_results.title: Senior Backend Developer - Bangalore
jobs_results.description:
Senior Backend Developer

Location: Bangalore, India
Invite to join Elastic Team Community

Distributed has created the world's best freelance developer community. Our mission is to provide freelancers with the same variety and freedom of freelancing, but with more benefits than permanent employment.

This is an opportunity to become part of our community and access projects unavailable to the broader market. While entrance to the Community doesn't guarantee selection for a project, it gives you expedited access to some of the most innovative projects in the world. Once accepted, you'll become part of a group of like-minded, skilled individuals.

All members are required to complete basic assessments in order to join the Elastic Team Community.

About joining the Elastic Team

If approved to join our Community by qualifying through the assessment process, you will automatically be one of the individuals who could be considered for exciting customer-centric projects that we are... currently engaged in for our clients.

Once on a project, you will be working closely with teams of engineers, QAs, and designers, producing detailed specifications and writing the programme codes, testing the product in controlled, real situations before going live.

We're proud to have Enterprise companies like Capita and BT, BBC, NHS, Virgin, Money, BP, Master Card, Tesco and Suzuki select us for delivering user-centric products.

Our mission as an organization is to provide our Community with access to the most exciting tech projects and to build a freelance career with us as we continue to scale as an organisation.

We're seeking a talented Senior Backend Developer sto join our Elastic Team community. As a Backend Developer, you'll work on exciting projects using cutting-edge technologies, collaborate with a talented team, and develop high-performance, scalable, and reliable backend systems.

Requirements:
• At least 3 years of experience as a Backend Developer
• Strong proficiency in Java and Springboot
• Experience with Kubernetes, containerization, Gitlab, Gitlab CI/CD, and Jenkins/CloudBee's Release Orchestration
• Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail
• Ability to work independently and as part of a team
• Excellent English communication and collaboration skills

About us

Distributed is proud to be an equal opportunities employer. Employees and contractors, as well as prospective employees and contractors, will all be treated equally and fairly. Distributed is committed to ensuring no less favourable treatment is experienced by any current or prospective employee because of any of the protected characteristics under the UK Equality Act 2010 or equivalent local equality legislation.

By submitting your application you give us permission to store and use the information from your CV and your answers to application questions

jobs_results.title: Backend Developer
jobs_results.description:
We need a highly skilled Back developper. If you are in accordance with our offer, then get ready to join our company!

Our mission:

We work on strategic initiative for reducing complexity of customer technical onboarding

In the initiative, we rework the tools and the onboarding workflow in order to simplify the onboarding, to be more robust and quicker.

Your day-to-day responsibilities include:
• Backend development
• Automatic Tests development
• Component delivery Industrialisation (CI/CD)
• Stories refinement
• Documentation writing
• Technical Support

We have many hardworking and dedicated peers that would like you to work with them. We are committed to continuous improvement. We are always looking for new and innovative ways to improve quality, reduce costs, build excellent solutions, and grow customer happiness. We would like to welcome an organized, innovative and process driven colleague to our team.

Signs of success:
• A success experiences
• In software development
•... In payment environment
• In delivery program
• In a large company
• A spirit in harmony with
• Innovation as a solution to improve step by step and now
• Excellence in not accepting problems as normal
• Cooperation to work together towards a common goal
• Empowerment to be autonomous in the face of our challenges

Skills we can’t do without:
• Methods assets
• Agility management
• Continuous improvement
• Continuous integration (Gitlab, Puppet)

Our teams are organized in Squads and Tribes in a context of Agile methodology type SAFE.
• Technical assets
• Backend: Spring, Java 11+
• Database: PostgresSQL
• Queue Messaging: Kafka
• System environment: RedHat 7
• Automatic tests: XRay, Gitlab CI, puppet
• Languages
• English: Good Level (both verbal and written) as we work with our Polish and French colleagues

jobs_results.title: Backend Developer - SDE - II
jobs_results.description:
Requirements
• Hands-on working experience on Core Java, Spring boot Microservices, RESTful web services technologies, JMS Messaging, Spring ORM (Hibernate, JPA) Drools.
• Strong knowledge of Data Structures, Algorithms, and Multi-Threadings.
• Hands-on experience in writing Unit tests using JUnit.
• Hands-on working experience in Event Processing, Kafka Topics, AWS SQS, and AWS MSR.
• Strong knowledge of NoSQL DBs (Mango DB / Elasticsearch).
• Strong knowledge of AWS, EC2 EKS, ECS, S3 Bucket, SQS, MSR, and RDS.
• Hands-on working experiences with Kubernetes deployment, kubectl, yaml, aws cli.
• Strong knowledge of Dockers, and docker commands.
• Working knowledge of any UNIX Systems.
• Good knowledge of CI/CD Tools (Jenkins, GitHub Actions, or Azure DevOps).
• Good Understanding of Web Service Security.

• Good Understanding of Web Service Security.

jobs_results.title: Backend Developer (Rust)
jobs_results.description:
Job description

We're looking to hire an experienced Backend Developer with experience in Rust to join our fast-moving team at AfterShoot!

Responsibilities
• Take ownership of the backend which may also involve having a decent amount of knowledge of working with Python
• Work with the team to port parts of the current Python Backend to Rust
• Work with the product and R&D team to understand business goals and help bring them to fruition
• Research new technologies and best practices and make sure we’re up to date

Preferred Experience
• Experience with compiling and linking third party libraries
• Experience with creating and maintaining scalable database architectures for edge devices.
• Diesel, Serde, Rocket, Tokio, Threads, low level optimizations.
• Experience making slow backends fly like a rocket.

Benefits
• Chance to work on an industry-defining product! Go read our testimonials: https://aftershoot.com
• Health and wellness benefits
• Competitive Pay
• Option to work... remotely (in person preferred but we allow for remote work)
• Flexibility with working hours - that means we don't believe in the traditional 9-5 work routine
• Your own custom work machine with your requested specifications (and color 😉 )

We're looking for people with a can-do attitude and a mindset to do something that impacts an industry as a whole! If you don't want to be yet another cog in the system and want to work on innovative and challenging problems, we'll be excited to have you!

About Us

At AfterShoot, we are building the Future of Photography!

With very little to no innovation in the past decade, we believe that the Photo Industry is ripe for disruption!

Aftershoot focuses on Machine Learning, Photography, Artificial Intelligence, Weddings, and Events. Their company has offices in Delaware. They have a mid-size team that's between 51-200 employees. To date, Aftershoot has raised $120k of funding; their latest round was closed on April 2021.

You can view their website at https://aftershoot.com/ or find them on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn

jobs_results.title: Backend NodeJS Developer
jobs_results.description:
DAZN is a tech-first sport streaming platform that reaches millions of users every week. We are challenging a traditional industry and giving power back to the fans. Our new Hyderabad tech hub will be the engine that drives us forward to the future. We’re pushing boundaries and doing things no-one has done before.

Here, you have the opportunity to make your mark and the power to make change happen - to make a difference for our customers.

When you join DAZN you will work on projects that impact millions of lives thanks to your critical contributions to our global products
This is the perfect place to work if you are passionate about technology and want an opportunity to use your creativity to help grow and scale a global range of IT systems, Infrastructure and IT Services. Our cutting-edge technology allows us to stream sports content to millions of concurrent viewers globally across multiple platforms and devices.

Join us in India’s beautiful "City of Pearls" and bring your... ambition to life.

We are looking for a Backend NodeJS Developer to join our growing team. As a Backend NodeJS Developer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining scalable and robust backend services that support our platform's live and on-demand video streaming capabilities. You will work closely with other developers, product managers, and quality assurance engineers to deliver high-quality software that meets our business requirements.
You'll be setup for success if you have:
• Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science or a related field
• 5+ years of experience in backend development using NodeJS, Express, and AWS technologies
• Strong understanding of software engineering principles and design patterns
• Experience working with databases such as MongoDB, MySQL, and PostgreSQL
• Experience with microservices architecture and RESTful APIs
• Experience with containerization technologies such as Docker and Kubernetes
• Proficiency in JavaScript

Even Better if you have:
• Experience with TypeScript and Angular
• Gaming or Streaming platforms
• Familiarity with serverless architectures using AWS Lambda
• Familiarity with CI/CD tools such as Jenkins and CircleCI
• Familiarity with messaging systems such as Kafka and RabbitMQ
• Familiarity with performance monitoring tools such as New Relic and Datadog

related_links.text: See web results for DAZN Careers

jobs_results.title: Lead Back End Developer
jobs_results.description:
Title: Lead Backend Developer (Node.js - Koa.js)

Location: Remote

Duration: Fulltime

We are seeking a highly motivated and skilled backend developer in Node.js (specifically Koa.js). As a backend developer, you will guide and work alongside the development team to design and implement server-side features for our mobile applications. You will have the opportunity to work on a variety of projects, including building APIs, integrating with third-party services, interface with ethereum blockchain technologies and optimising database performance including scalability.

As a backend developer, you will be responsible for:
• Design and implement server-side features for our mobile applications using Node.js and Koa.js. Including building the internal API for our mobile application.
• * Build APIs that integrate with third-party/external services.
• * Optimise database performance and scalability.
• * Collaborate with the frontend team to ensure smooth integration of the backend with the... application.
• * Collaborating with the development team to design and implement new features.
• * Testing, Debugging and fixing issues in the existing API.
• * Working with a team of backend developers including interns.
• * Ideate, collaborate and build products from scratch with the other teams in the organisation.
• * Implementing and managing AWS.
• * Refactoring and commenting code, including code written by other team members.
• * Participating in code reviews and providing constructive feedback.
• * Write clean, well-documented, and maintainable code.
• * Learning and staying up-to-date with the latest Node.js, Koa.js and backend development best practices.

To be successful in this role, you should have:
• Strong understanding of Node.js and experience with server-side development.
• * A strong knowledge, understanding and experience of object-oriented programming concepts.
• * Experience with AWS (Lambda, SQS, SES, ECS etc.).
• * Experience with Express.js is required and Koa.js is preferred.
• * Experience with Git version control.
• * Experience with testing frameworks such as Mocha.
• * Experience with Solidity Smart contracts on EVM is preferred.
• * Good communication and teamwork skills.
• * Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.
• * Experience working in a startup environment is a bonus, but not required.
• * A strong passion for learning and staying up-to-date with the latest technologies.

Education and Qualifications:
• Must have a bachelor’s degree in computer science or a similar field.
• * If graduated in an unrelated field, then showing strong experience in Node.js, Express.js, Koa.js (or API projects) and AWS as part of a portfolio can serve as a qualification as well.
• * Certifications from courses can also be submitted as supplements to the above.
• * GitHub profile along with public projects must be submitted as part of the application.

About Us

We are a Web3 Startup building products that require no education and work just like traditional Web2 applications.

We offer a dynamic and collaborative work environment, with opportunities for personal and professional growth. If you are a self-starter with a strong desire to learn and grow as a developer, we encourage you to apply for this internship opportunity.

Salary

To be determined

items:
Title: Lead Backend Developer (Node.js - Koa.js)

Location: Remote

Duration: Fulltime

We are seeking a highly motivated and skilled backend developer in Node.js (specifically Koa.js). As a backend developer, you will guide and work alongside the development team to design and implement server-side features for our mobile applications. You will have the opportunity to work on a variety of projects, including building APIs, integrating with third-party services, interface with ethereum blockchain technologies and optimising database performance including scalability.

As a backend developer, you will be responsible for:
• Design and implement server-side features for our mobile applications using Node.js and Koa.js. Including building the internal API for our mobile application.
• * Build APIs that integrate with third-party/external services.
• * Optimise database performance and scalability.
• * Collaborate with the frontend team to ensure smooth integration of the backend with the... application.
• * Collaborating with the development team to design and implement new features.
• * Testing, Debugging and fixing issues in the existing API.
• * Working with a team of backend developers including interns.
• * Ideate, collaborate and build products from scratch with the other teams in the organisation.
• * Implementing and managing AWS.
• * Refactoring and commenting code, including code written by other team members.
• * Participating in code reviews and providing constructive feedback.
• * Write clean, well-documented, and maintainable code.
• * Learning and staying up-to-date with the latest Node.js, Koa.js and backend development best practices.

To be successful in this role, you should have:
• Strong understanding of Node.js and experience with server-side development.
• * A strong knowledge, understanding and experience of object-oriented programming concepts.
• * Experience with AWS (Lambda, SQS, SES, ECS etc.).
• * Experience with Express.js is required and Koa.js is preferred.
• * Experience with Git version control.
• * Experience with testing frameworks such as Mocha.
• * Experience with Solidity Smart contracts on EVM is preferred.
• * Good communication and teamwork skills.
• * Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.
• * Experience working in a startup environment is a bonus, but not required.
• * A strong passion for learning and staying up-to-date with the latest technologies.

Education and Qualifications:
• Must have a bachelor’s degree in computer science or a similar field.
• * If graduated in an unrelated field, then showing strong experience in Node.js, Express.js, Koa.js (or API projects) and AWS as part of a portfolio can serve as a qualification as well.
• * Certifications from courses can also be submitted as supplements to the above.
• * GitHub profile along with public projects must be submitted as part of the application.

About Us

We are a Web3 Startup building products that require no education and work just like traditional Web2 applications.

We offer a dynamic and collaborative work environment, with opportunities for personal and professional growth. If you are a self-starter with a strong desire to learn and grow as a developer, we encourage you to apply for this internship opportunity.

Salary

To be determined

jobs_results.title: Java Backend Developer
jobs_results.description:
Company Description

Jobs for Humanity is dedicated to building an inclusive and just employment ecosystem. Therefore, we have dedicated this job posting to individuals coming from the following communities: Refugee, Neurodivergent, Single Parent, Blind or Low Vision, Deaf of Hard of Hearing Black, Hispanic, Asian, Military Veterans, the Elderly, the LGBTQ, and Justice Impacted individuals. If you identify with any of the following communities do not hesitate to register.

Company Name: FIS Global

Job Description

Position Type :
Full time

Type Of Hire :
Experienced (relevant combo of work and education)

Education Desired :
Bachelor of Computer Engineering

Travel Percentage :
0%
• Are you curious, motivated, and forward-thinking? At FIS you’ll have the opportunity to work on some of the most challenging and relevant issues in financial services and technology. Our talented people empower us, and we believe in being part of a team that is open, collaborative, entrepreneurial... passionate and above all fun.

About the team

Worldpay’s eComm Engineering branch specialises in delivering online payment services to our customers and are looking for Engineers to join our team and take our systems to the next level.

Operating within a collaborative SAFe environment, we strive to deliver effective solutions for our customers using our evolving payment platform.

We are looking for proactive team players who would like to work in the Fintech sector, with likeminded individuals that want to develop robust and scalable applications for the growing market.

Position- Java Developer

Job Descripting-
• Technical Skills Required
• Strong knowledge of Core Java and Object-oriented programming concepts and principles.
• Experience with Spring, Spring Boot, Spring MVC, Spring REST, ORM - Hibernate or JPA
• Experience in Web Services, preferably REST APIs (XML, JSON).
• Kafka/Spark experience.
• Demonstrated implementation in application security using OAuth2, OIDC.
• Ability to design, develop and implement scalable, elastic microservice based platforms. Should have good experience in circuit breakers, api gateways, discovery server, configuration management etc.
• Experience in following best Coding, Security, Unit testing and Documentation standards and practices and have sound knowledge of Sonarqube, checkmarx etc.
• Experience with modern JavaScript frameworks like Angular, Jquery, Node.js, bootstrap
• Experience with No SQL database like Dynamo DB.
• Experience with build management systems like - Maven, Gradle.
• *
• What we offer you
• •Competitive salary and excellent bonus potential.
• •Attractive benefits including private medical cover, dental cover, and travel insurance
• •Training across core financial, sales and FIS solutions
• •A multifaceted job with a high degree of responsibility and a broad spectrum of opportunities
• •A modern, international work environment and a dedicated and motivated team
• Job Posting Description

Job Posting Description

Attachments

Business Process History

Privacy Statement

FIS is committed to protecting the privacy and security of all personal information that we process in order to provide services to our clients. For specific information on how FIS protects personal information online, please see the Online Privacy Notice.

Sourcing Model

Recruitment at FIS works primarily on a direct sourcing model; a relatively small portion of our hiring is through recruitment agencies. FIS does not accept resumes from recruitment agencies which are not on the preferred supplier list and is not responsible for any related fees for resumes submitted to job postings, our employees, or any other part of our company.

#pridepass
